option.od: print the help message and exit.
print the RST version number and exit.
the input file is a raw (dat) format file.
filenames of the raw (dat) format file to concatenate.
filename of the raw (dat) format file to create.

synopsis.p: Concatenates a set of raw (dat) format files.

description.p: Concatenates a set of raw (dat) format files.

example.description: Concatenates together all files called "19981020.*.gbr.dat" to produce a file called "19981020.gbr.C.dat".
